note:
Independent Facilitator, massage therapist, neurodivergent, person, living on Tongvan and Acjachemen land.

I try to learn from lived experience, both mine and others. Black lives matter.

I was socialized as a white woman and as I understand what this means, I have been working to undermine that socialization.

header pic is a galaxy spread diagonally across the screen, so many colors, violet and deepest blue and white stars.
